<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	IV.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	DUTIES
	AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE COMMITTEE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
<I>
	A.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<I>
	Executive
	and Director Compensation
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee shall have the following duties
	and responsibilities with respect to the Company&rsquo;s executive compensation plans:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To review at least annually the goals and objectives of the Company&rsquo;s
	executive compensation plans, and amend, or recommend that the Board amend, these goals and objectives if the Committee deems it
	appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To review at least annually the Company&rsquo;s executive compensation
	plans in light of the Company&rsquo;s goals and objectives with respect to such plans, and, if the Committee deems it appropriate,
	adopt, or recommend to the Board the adoption of, new, or the amendment of existing, executive compensation plans.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To evaluate annually the performance of the Chief Executive Officer in
	light of the goals and objectives of the Company&rsquo;s executive compensation plans, and, either as a Committee or together with
	the other independent directors (as directed by the Board), determine and approve the Chief Executive Officer&rsquo;s compensation
	level based on this evaluation.&nbsp; In determining the long-term incentive component of the Chief Executive Officer&rsquo;s compensation,
	the Committee shall consider factors as it determines relevant, which may include, for example, the Company&rsquo;s performance
	and relative stockholder return, the value of similar awards to chief executive officers of comparable companies, and the awards
	given to the Chief Executive Officer of the Company in past years.&nbsp; The Committee may discuss the Chief Executive Officer&rsquo;s
	compensation with the Board if it chooses to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To evaluate annually the performance of the other executive officers of
	the Company in light of the goals and objectives of the Company&rsquo;s executive compensation plans, and either as a Committee
	or together with the other independent directors (as directed by the Board), determine and approve the compensation of such other
	executive officers.&nbsp; To the extent that long-term incentive compensation is a component of such executive officer&rsquo;s
	compensation, the Committee shall consider all relevant factors in determining the appropriate level of such compensation, including
	the factors applicable with respect to the Chief Executive Officer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To evaluate annually the appropriate level of compensation for Board and
	Committee service by non-employee directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	Review and recommend to the Board the adoption of or changes to the compensation
	of the Company&rsquo;s independent directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To
	review and approve any severance or termination arrangements to be made with any executive officer of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	h)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To perform such duties and responsibilities as may be assigned to the
	Board or the Committee under the terms of any executive compensation plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To review perquisites or other personal benefits to the Company&rsquo;s
	executive officers and directors and recommend any changes to the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	j)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To consider the results of the most recent shareholder advisory vote on
	executive compensation as required by Section&nbsp;14A of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &ldquo;Exchange
	Act&rdquo;), and, to the extent the Committee determines it appropriate to do so, take such results into consideration in connection
	with the review and approval of executive officer compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	k)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To
	review and discuss with management the Company&rsquo;s CD&amp;A, and based on that review and discussion, to recommend to the
	Board that the CD&amp;A be included in the Company&rsquo;s annual proxy statement or annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	l)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To review compensation arrangements for the Company&rsquo;s employees to
	evaluate whether incentive and other forms of pay encourage unnecessary or excessive risk taking, and review and discuss, at least
	annually, the relationship between risk management policies and practices, corporate strategy and the Company&rsquo;s compensation
	arrangements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	2
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage370"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	m)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To the extent it deems necessary, review and approve the terms of any compensation
	&ldquo;clawback&rdquo; or similar policy or agreement between the Company and the Company&rsquo;s executive officers or other employees
	subject to Section&nbsp;16 of the Exchange Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	n)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	Review, recommend to the Board, and administer all plans that require &ldquo;disinterested
	administration&rdquo; under Rule 16b-3 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	o)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To
	prepare the Compensation Committee Report in accordance with the rules&nbsp;and regulations of the SEC for inclusion in the Company&rsquo;s
	annual proxy statement or annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	p)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	Retain
	(at the Company&rsquo;s expense) outside consultants and obtain assistance from members of management as the Committee deems appropriate
	in the exercise of its authority.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	q)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	To
	perform such other functions as assigned by law, the Company&rsquo;s charter or bylaws or the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	r)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	Make
	reports and recommendations to the Board within the scope of its functions and advise the officers of the Company regarding various
	personnel matters as may be raised with the Committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL CALIBRI,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	s)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF">
	Approve all special perquisites, special cash payments and other special
	compensation and benefit arrangements for the Company&rsquo;s executive officers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in the
	foregoing, the Committee shall have sole discretion and authority with respect to any action regarding compensation payable to
	the Chief Executive Officer or other executive officers of the Company that the Committee intends to constitute &ldquo;qualified
	performance-based compensation&rdquo; for purposes of section 162(m)&nbsp;of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended and
	the Treasury Regulations promulgated thereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
<I>
	B.
</I>
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<I>
	General
	Compensation and Employee Benefit Plans
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee shall have the following duties
	and responsibilities with respect to the Company&rsquo;s general compensation and employee benefit plans, including incentive-compensation
	and equity-based plans:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To
	review at least annually the goals and objectives of the Company&rsquo;s general compensation plans and other employee benefit
	plans, including incentive-compensation and equity-based plans, and amend, or recommend that the Board amend, these goals and objectives
	if the Committee deems it appropriate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To
	review at least annually the Company&rsquo;s general compensation plans and other employee benefit plans, including incentive-compensation
	and equity-based plans, in light of the goals and objectives of these plans, and recommend that the Board amend these plans if
	the Committee deems it appropriate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To
	review all equity-compensation plans to be submitted for stockholder approval under the Principal Market listing standards, and
	to review and, in the Committee&rsquo;s sole discretion, approve all equity-compensation plans that are exempt from such stockholder
	approval requirement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Approve all special perquisites, special
	cash payments and other special compensation and benefit arrangements for the Company&rsquo;s employees.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To
	perform such duties and responsibilities as may be assigned to the Board or the Committee under the terms of any compensation or
	other employee benefit plan, including any incentive-compensation or equity-based plan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage371"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	V.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	ROLE
	OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Chief Executive Officer may make, and the
	Committee may consider, recommendations to the Committee regarding the Company&rsquo;s compensation and employee benefit plans
	and practices, including its executive compensation plans, its incentive-compensation and equity-based plans with respect to executive
	officers (other than the Chief Executive Officer) and the Company&rsquo;s director compensation arrangements. Any such member,
	members or subcommittee shall be subject to this Charter.&nbsp; The decisions of any such member, members or subcommittees to which
	authority is delegated under this paragraph shall be presented to the full Committee at its next regularly scheduled meeting.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	VI.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	DELEGATION
	OF AUTHORITY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee may form subcommittees for any
	purpose that the Committee deems appropriate and may delegate to such subcommittees such power and authority as the Committee deems
	appropriate;&nbsp;
<I>
	provided, however,
</I>
	&nbsp;that no subcommittee shall consist of fewer than two members; and&nbsp;
<I>
	provided
	further
</I>
	&nbsp;that the Committee shall not delegate to a subcommittee any power or authority required by any law, regulation
	or listing standard to be exercised by the Committee as a whole.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	VII.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	EVALUATION
	OF THE COMMITTEE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee shall, no less frequently than
	annually, evaluate its performance.&nbsp; In conducting this review, the Committee shall evaluate whether this Charter appropriately
	addresses the matters that are or should be within its scope and shall recommend such changes as it deems necessary or appropriate.&nbsp;
	The Committee shall address all matters that the Committee considers relevant to its performance, including at least the following:&nbsp;
	the adequacy, appropriateness and quality of the information and recommendations presented by the Committee to the Board, the manner
	in which they were discussed or debated, and whether the number and length of meetings of the Committee were adequate for the Committee
	to complete its work in a thorough and thoughtful manner.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee shall deliver to the Board a report,
	which may be oral, setting forth the results of its evaluation, including any recommended amendments to this Charter and any recommended
	changes to the Company&rsquo;s or the Board&rsquo;s policies or procedures.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	VIII.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	INVESTIGATIONS
	AND STUDIES; OUTSIDE ADVISERS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee may conduct or authorize investigations
	into or studies of matters within the Committee&rsquo;s scope of responsibilities, and may, in its sole discretion, retain or obtain
	the advice of a compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser.&nbsp; The Committee shall be directly responsible for
	the appointment, compensation and oversight of the work of any compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser retained
	by the Committee, the expense of which shall be borne by the Company.&nbsp; The Committee may select a compensation consultant,
	legal counsel or other adviser to the Committee only after taking into consideration the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	provision of other services to the Company by the person that employs the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	amount of fees received from the Company by the person that employs the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser,
	as a percentage of the total revenue of the person that employs the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	policies and procedures of the person that employs the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser that are designed
	to prevent conflicts of interest:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	business or personal relationship of the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser with a member of the Committee;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	stock of the Company owned by the compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage372"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any
	business or personal relationship of the compensation consultant, legal counsel, other adviser or the person employing the adviser
	with an executive officer of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	The Committee shall conduct the independence
	assessment with respect to any compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser that provides advice to the Committee, other
	than:&nbsp; (i)&nbsp;in-house legal counsel; and (ii)&nbsp;any compensation consultant, legal counsel or other adviser whose role
	is limited to the following activities for which no disclosure would be required under Item 407(e)(3)(iii)&nbsp;of Regulation S-K:&nbsp;
	consulting on any broad-based plan that does not discriminate in scope, terms, or operation, in favor of executive officers or
	directors of the Company, and that is available generally to all salaried employees; or providing information that either is not
	customized for the Company or that is customized based on parameters that are not developed by the compensation consultant, and
	about which the compensation consultant does not provide advice.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Nothing herein requires a compensation consultant,
	legal counsel or other compensation adviser to be independent, only that the Committee consider the enumerated independence factors
	before selecting or receiving advice from a compensation consultant, legal counsel or other compensation adviser.&nbsp; The Committee
	may select or receive advice from any compensation consultant, legal counsel or other compensation adviser it prefers, including
	ones that are not independent, after considering the six independence factors outlined above.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Nothing herein shall be construed:&nbsp; (1)&nbsp;to
	require the Committee to implement or act consistently with the advice or recommendations of the compensation consultant, legal
	counsel or other adviser to the Committee; or (2)&nbsp;to affect the ability or obligation of the Committee to exercise its own
	judgment in fulfillment of its duties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	IX.
</B>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	AMENDMENTS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Any amendment or other modification of this Charter
	shall be made and approved by the full Board.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
<B>
	X.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DISCLOSURE OF CHARTER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	If required by the rules of the SEC or any Principal
	Market, this Charter, as amended from time to time, shall be made available to the public on the Company&rsquo;s website.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	* * *
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	While the members of the Committee have the duties
	and responsibilities set forth in this Charter, nothing contained in this Charter is intended to create, or should be construed
	as creating, any responsibility or liability of members of the Committee, except to the extent otherwise provided under applicable
	federal or state law.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	5
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 1PT; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1.5PT SOLID; WIDTH: 100%">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /RULE-PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Conyers
	Park Acquisition Corp (the &quot;Company&quot;) intends to file a Registration Statement on Form S-1 (together with any amendments
	or supplements thereto. the &quot;Registration Statement'&quot;) registering securities for issuance in its initial public offering.
	As required by Rule 438 under the Securities Act of 1933, as a mended, the undersigned hereby consents to being named in the Registration
	Statement as a Director Nominee.
</FONT>
